document_data.name: Selduth Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Selduth Street''' was a long, secondary avenue in [[Waterdeep]] that began in the city's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] and went further westward until it spanned the length of [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]].
document_data.Location:
This road ran in a curve northwest off of [[Zelduth Street]], with corduroy-log paving. It then straightened out into a flat, westward line, with cobblestone pavement, until it reached it finally terminated on [[Swords Street]] across from [[Turnback Court]].

Along the way to that destination, Selduth Street intersected many of the city's major avenues. These included the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]], the [[Street of Bells]], the [[Street of the Sword]], [[Warrior's Way]], the [[Street of Silver]], and the [[Street of Silks]]. It also acted as the northern terminus of [[Asmagh's Alley]] and [[Spindle Street]], as well as the southern terminus of [[Irimar's Walk]].

Notable Locations.The [[Mighty Manticore]]: A tavern located on the corner of where Selduth Street intersected the Street of Silver.
Notable Locations.The [[Pampered Traveler]]: An inn located on the corner of where Selduth Street intersected the Street of Bells.
